decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 1505/PL02; 1506/PL03; 1506/PL04; 1506/PL05; 1506/PL06; 1506/PL07; 1506/PL08; 1506/PL09; 1506/PL010; 1506/PL110; 1506/PL12 rev A; 1506/PL14 rev A; 1506/PL13 rev A; 1506/PL15 rev A; 1506/PL16 rev A; WM-R01-PR-101 Rev R01; WM-R01-PR-102 Rev R01; WM-R01-PR-103 Rev R01; WM-R01-PR-104 Rev R01; WM-R01-PR-105 Rev R01; WM-R01-PR-107 Rev R01
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B, 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, policies GG1, D3, D4, D5, and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the Ealing Town Centre Conservation Area Management Plan (2007)
| The proposed front roof lights shall be of the non-projecting Conservation Area type and shall be installed flush with the plane of the roof and shall be retained as such thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of ensuring a high quality of design that preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Ealing Common and Ealing Town Centre  Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D3, D4, and HC1 of the London Plan (2021)
| The development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the submitted details of tree protection

Reason: To ensure appropriate tree protection in the interests of protecting the visual amenity of the area, contributing to the quality and character of London's environment, air quality and adapting to and mitigating climate change in accordance with policies G5 and G7 of the London Plan 2021, policy 5.10 of Ealing's Development Management DPD and Ealing's tree Strategy.
description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73a) to vary Condition 2 (Approved Plans) and Condition 3 (External Materials) of planning permission ref: 191487HH dated 14/11/2019 for: Single storey rear extension; installation of one rear dormer window and installation of three roof lights. Variation seeks to allow changes of materials from artificial slate, to zinc roofing for approved single storey rear extension
